query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_clientes,
  COUNT(DISTINCT cnpj) as cnpjs_unicos,
  SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(createdAt) = '2025-10-21' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as originais,
  SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(createdAt) = '2025-11-19' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as enriquecidos,
  ROUND(AVG(qualidadeScore), 2) as score_medio,
  MIN(qualidadeScore) as score_min,
  MAX(qualidadeScore) as score_max
FROM clientes;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4LxBqKfHv1LE9mk.f65588d6698e --database XpSHcSiEisTmX38X46V9tQ --execute 
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_clientes,
  COUNT(DISTINCT cnpj) as cnpjs_unicos,
  SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(createdAt) = '2025-10-21' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as originais,
  SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(createdAt) = '2025-11-19' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as enriquecidos,
  ROUND(AVG(qualidadeScore), 2) as score_medio,
  MIN(qualidadeScore) as score_min,
  MAX(qualidadeScore) as score_max
FROM clientes;
